name: Jack Frost
text:
Greetings! My name's Frosty!
Welcome to Magical Snowland of snow and fluff... huh?

Jack Frost, who called himself Frosty, greeted them with a beaming smile.
Both stood frozen, surprised by the unexpected encounter.

name: Snegurochka
text:
B-Brother Jack...!?
That outfit, no, what are you doing here...?

name: Jack Frost
text:
W-Wait... Snegurochka,
don't say my real name here!

Jack hurriedly covered Snegurochka's mouth and
looked around to see if anyone had heard them.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Snegurochka, you followed me here, didn't you?
I told you to leave me alone.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Don't scold her too much.
She was lost, so I guided her here.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Boss, I mean, Korpokkur, you...
You just had to do unnecessary things.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, hey, have you forgotten where you are, Frosty?
If you make such a scary face, the children will get scared and hide.
As he spoke, children came running towards Jack.

name: Children
text:
Frosty!!
Let's take a picture together~! Give us a hug!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ah, of course.
Come on, one at a time.

name: Trickster
text:
Eheheh, so cool and cold~!
Amazing, it feels great~!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hahaha, I'll take the picture.
Come on, is that pose good enough?

name: Child
text:
Um, Frosty.
I want one where you gently pat my head!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Let's see, like this?
Now, look at the camera? Say, 'Frosty'—!

Snegurochka was surprised to see how popular Jack was with the children,
but she quickly lined up in the picture queue herself.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, you're adapting a little too fast.
Are you trying to get a blackmail photo?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Haha, I'm done for.
Tomorrow, these pictures will be spread all over school, and my fate is sealed.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, just who do you think I am!?
I would never do such a thing!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm just a guest who came to the amusement park.
I just want to take a picture with Frosty-san, that's all!

However, someone noticed Snegurochka's presence, and the children
started asking to take pictures with the magical girl they admired.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, hey, you guys.
Snegurochka is on her private time, don't bother her.

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, I don't mind. For everyone's smiles!
Because that's what I, Snegurochka, am here for!

Once the crowd around Snegurochka and Jack subsided,
the two began to talk quietly, trying not to be overheard.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...So, you skipped school to follow me here.
You're a bad kid too, aren't you?

name: Snegurochka
text:
You said it, didn't you?
That you'd tell me if I skipped with you.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Yeah, I did say that, but...
You seemed like such a good kid, I never thought you'd actually skip...

name: Jack Frost
text:
So? What do you want?
Go ahead and expose me if you want!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez~ I told you I wouldn't do that!
But, why are you keeping it a secret?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Making children smile at an amusement
park isn't something to hide, it's amazing!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Grandpa also acknowledges it as an extracurricular activity, right?
So, there's nothing wrong with it, you should be proud!

name: Jack Frost
text:
W-What? No, that's... someone like me,
who's like a delinquent at school, how can I possibly say that?

The muttering Jack was somewhat
flustered by Snegurochka's words.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That has nothing to do with it!
If you told everyone, you would definitely become popular at school, too.

name: Jack Frost
text:
N-No, I don't want to be popular...
I'm just here because I like children...

name: Jack Frost
text:
...These children are great, they're truly children of winter.
Even in winter, they'd still come to me with smiles on their face.

At the corner of their vision,
Korpokkur nodded repeatedly in agreement.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, then you must really like me,
a child and a snow maiden, right?

name: Jack Frost
text: ...You are, something different.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez~ stop being so blunt all of a sudden!
Why, I'm not even bothered by the midwinter cold~.

Seeing Snegurochka pouting in annoyance,
a smile escaped Jack.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, if you change your mind, just let me know anytime.
Magical Girl Snegurochka is on the side of hard-working brothers!

Just as Jack was about to say "thank you" to Snegurochka,
who was speaking her mind, something happened—

name: Child
text:
Frosty~!
Come take a picture with me, too!

name: Jack Frost
text:
...! Hahaha, you're full of energy!
Come on over, let's take a picture together!

name: Snegurochka
text:
...And so, everyone!
How about setting the Santa Departure Ceremony at an amusement park!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
The venue will be Magical Snowland!
It's a wonderful amusement park, so I'd like to ask for their cooperation!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Since the person in charge there is from Ojibo Academy,
I think it would be a good idea to ask for cooperation from the academy itself.

name: Male Student
text:
Wow! As expected of Snegurochka-chan!
You're a genius! That sounds fun! A nice Santa Idea!

name: Female Student
text:
But, Snegurochka-chan, isn't Ojibo Academy a place
with many good children that we have to deliver presents to?

name: Female Student
text:
Is it okay for us Santas, who work for children,
to ask for help from children themselves?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I said 'cooperation', but I meant to have them
enjoy the Christmas event together with us.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I actually have some connections with
specialists who entertain children, so...

name: Male Student
text:
Whoa~ that's awesome!
Is it someone from the entertainment industry~?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, it's a secret.
But I'm sure everyone will be surprised!

Snegurochka winked slightly, for Jack only to see.
Seeing that, Jack sighed deeply.

Under the cold winter sky, Snegurochka and Jack sat side by side on
a courtyard bench, eating deli bread they bought from the school store.

Even though it was cold enough to feel chilly even bundled up,
the two seemed perfectly fine, even finding the temperature ideal.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Mmm, delicious!
This weather is just right for us, isn't it?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Hey, you.
Don't you think it's time you stop hanging around me?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Why?
Am I actually bothering you...?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ugh, why are you suddenly acting so timid?
It's not like that, but...

name: Jack Frost
text:
Lately, people have been spreading strange rumors about you.
Because you kept calling me 'Brother'...

Snegurochka burst out laughing as
Jack's voice gradually became softer.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ahahaha, Brother, you've been tricked~!
You're so kind, even when you try to push me away.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I don't mind what people say about me, alright?
Brother, you've forgotten that I'm from the entertainment industry, haven't you?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I don't care at all if people say things about me and you now, Brother.
...Or rather, should I have cared a little?

name: Jack Frost
text:
You... You're really looking down on me, aren't you?
If you keep pushing your luck—

name: Snegurochka
text:
No~ stop, that hurts, that hurts, that hurts!
Stop ruffling my hair~!

As they were squabbling, the two noticed they were being
watched by other students passing by and stopped moving.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Haaah, by the way, Snegurochka.
You said it before, didn't you, about talking about my side gig at the amusement park.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother, don't tell me!
You've finally made up your mind!?

name: Jack Frost
text:
No, not entirely.
But, well, I thought maybe it wouldn't hurt to say something...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Then listen, listen!
I have a great idea!!

name: Jack Frost
text:
(She thinks I'm serious about her, so
I can't say no, but I really should have refused!)

Before his eyes, Snegurochka was happily talking
about the amusement park to her classmates.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Well, if it comes down to it,
I can just take a day off as Frosty on Christmas day.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm not even there every day now.
It might seem unnatural if I'm not there for a Christmas event, but...

Jack muttered to himself, but then he
looked at Snegurochka again and clenched his fist.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Alright... I'll do it.
Or maybe I should join that discussion now...

name: Jack Frost
text:
……………
W-Well, I guess that can wait for later.

Chapter 1:
Magical Reality

name: Jack Frost
text: ...So, mind explaining why you are here again?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Why, it's for a preliminary inspection, of course!
It's officially decided to be the venue for this year's departure ceremony.

name: Korpokkur
text:
That's right. Well, from my perspective,
if it makes the children happy, there's no reason to refuse.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...Besides, personally,
I don't dislike Santas among adults.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you, Korpokkur-san.
I'll definitely make it a wonderful Santa Departure Ceremony!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hehe, no problem.
If you have any other troubles, just give me a holler!

Jack seemed to want to say something about Korpokkur,
but in the children's paradise, he couldn't maintain a scowl.

He quickly switched back to his gentle polar bear persona, Frosty.
Today was a holiday, and as Jack redoubled his efforts—

options.text: Look, there's a cute polar bear!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, what are you doing?
Do you like that kind of thing?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Master, look closely!
Moritaka is softer, rounder, and, feels better.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Come on, come on, since you've gone to the trouble of dressing up, you have to take a picture or two, or as many as you want, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hastur wouldn't wear it no matter how many times I told him...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmm, what are you doing? Do you like that kind of thing?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Master, look closely! Moritaka is softer and rounder, and feels better.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Come on, come on, since you've gone to the trouble of dressing up, you have to take a picture or two, or as many as you want!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hastur wouldn't wear it no matter how many times I told him...

options.text: There are so many amazing kids here!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: There's no such thing as adults or children at an amusement park, it's about having the most fun!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So, let's take a picture!
We went to the trouble of dressing up, after all!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hastur wouldn't wear it no matter how many times I told him...

name: Hastur
text:
Of course not?
Why would I wear such a carefree outfit!?

name: Hastur
text:
Besides! Why do I have to be in a picture with you!?
[Player] and I, just the two of us are more than enough.

name: Yoshito
text:
I'm not really into pictures or anything...
And I'm especially bad at smiling at that.

name: Yoshito
text:
And, why am I here with all of you,
instead of being with Moritaka?

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, I wanted to turn your
unhappy aura into a happy one.

name: Tianzun
text:
Come on, for pictures and amusement parks,
it's all about getting used to it, yeah!?
I'll make you laugh, so come here quickly!

Korpokkur noticed [Player], who had ended up coming to the
amusement park with the four of them, after their discussion went nowhere.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hmm... If it isn't you, [Player].
Did you come to this amusement park to regain your childlike heart too?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so? Then this Magical Snowland is perfect!
I can even guide you if you want.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Believe it or not, I'm the owner of this amusement park.

options.text: What are you here for, Korpokkur?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Why, because I'm the owner of this amusement park, of course?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Is that so? Then this Magical Snowland is perfect! I can even guide you if you want.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Believe it or not, I'm the owner of this amusement park.

name: Korpokkur
text:
This is an ideal place that I created
with someone else for the children.

options.text: Are you talking about that polar bear?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh? Oh, he's certainly the face of this amusement park, but no, he's not the one.
I just picked him up randomly.

options.text: Your methods are like an adult's.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Stop it, seriously?
I'm still a cute child, you know.

options.text: I'm not being refused, am I?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What do you mean?
If you want to be shut out, I'd gladly freeze you and let you flow down the river?
...That's just a kid's joke.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...It was the wish of the person who created this place with me.
They wanted adults to be able to enjoy themselves like children, too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course, I was against it, but... now, it's not so bad.
While you're in this ideal world, your adult heart will be overwritten with snow.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Korpokkur-san, is that someone you know?
Nice to meet you, I'm Snegurochka!

Snegurochka, who peeked out from
behind Korpokkur, greeted them with a smile.

options.text: Wow, I'm a big fan of yours!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, I'm happy.
Make-up Snow Maiden!
...Just kidding.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, I'm happy.
Make-up Snow Maiden!
...Just kidding.

name: Snegurochka
text:
You all are so close, by the way,
and you're all dressed up so wonderfully.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, that's right, isn't it?
See, I knew it would be good to get into the spirit!

name: Tianzun
text:
They say it's all about enjoying yourself to the fullest, but ahh,
had Hastur joined us, it would have been even happier!

name: Hastur
text:
Shut up! I already regret being here with you all!
My eyes hurt from all the attention.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That just means you're charming!
Getting into character is very important!

name: Tianzun
text:
What, you understand, girl!
That's right, it really does change your mood, doesn't it!?

options.text: How do you have so many costumes again?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I love parades, I'm a party person!
Costume parades and cosplay participation are my specialties!

options.text: I'm happy because I've always wanted to go to a cosplay amusement park!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, isn't it~? You look great too!
My judgment wasn't wrong, it seems.

options.text: You chose this amusement park because it's OK to wear costumes, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Exactly! Most places forbid it unless it's during an event.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehehe~ now I'm a bad villain!
[Player], you can punish me if you want?

name: Yoshito
text:
Please stop directing your perverse desires at Master!
If you really want punishment, I'll gladly give you a quick end...

name: Tianzun
text:
Whoa, whoa, whoa, it's a joke, a joke!
I said let's have a happy day today, didn't I?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey [Player], are these guys okay?
Please spare me from the bloodshed and improper cosplay.

options.text: He's a morals teacher, so he should be fine... Probably.
I'll take responsibility and keep an eye on them.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hehe, looks like I'll be going with you.
My recommended route is going clockwise, visiting all the popular spots first!

name: Hastur
text:
Look at the park map, [Player]!
There's a ride that perfectly recreates interstellar space travel using VR, apparently?

name: Hastur
text:
That's quite bold of them to say that in front of me?
Hahaha, I'll check its quality with my own eyes!

name: Yoshito
text:
I just... want to go to the Ferris wheel and the castle.
They're perfect for taking pictures with my dolls.

options.text: Planning the route is fun, isn't it?
What should we do while waiting?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Leave that to me!
I've prepared some fun mini-games for everyone here.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Leave that to me!
I've researched everything perfectly!

text:
Snegurochka watched [Player] and the others
talking happily, a little enviously.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Um... is it alright if I join you guys?
I actually came alone...

Everyone looked at each other to confirm their intentions to
Snegurochka's offer, but there seemed to be no need.

name: Tianzun
text:
Of course! The more the merrier!
Right, [Player]?

name: Hastur
text:
This group is already chaotic enough
to make me doubt my sanity, after all.

options.text: On the contrary, are you really okay with this?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes! Please!
Hehe, I knew Brother was busy, but...

name: Korpokkur
text:
What, if you want to hang out with Jack, I'll tell him.
We can drag him along anyway.

Before Snegurochka could stop him,
Korpokkur brought Jack back from somewhere.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Korpokkur, you've been treating me roughly lately, too.
And now you're saying I have to tour an amusement park with mostly strangers...?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, hey, who do you think picked you up wandering around the
interference zone of Oji and Arakawa and made you 'Frosty'?

name: Korpokkur
text:
You owe me a lot.
So, you have to listen to what I say, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
That's too tyrannical...
Besides, isn't it bad for me to walk around the park like this?

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's fine, don't worry. You look veru different from when you're Frosty.
You're practically a different person.

name: Korpokkur
text:
If you absolutely insist, I'll hide you with my butterburs.
You... well, I guess I can let you in.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...You know I'd never go in there, don't you?
You aren't even a cute kid, the only thing childish about you is your height!

options.text: Brother, you were that polar bear!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Oops, you found out in an instant.
Well, it's fine, right? They aren't from Santa School anyways.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You, really, you... This is the kind of thing that gets spread on social media tomorrow,
that'll expose my usual behavior and get me in trouble, isn't it?

name: Jack Frost
text:
'Amusement Park Mascot's True Identity is a Delinquent Student!?'
...If something like that happens, I'll drag you down with me for hiring me.

name: Korpokkur
text:
It won't happen, relax.
Save your imagination for graffiti.

Jack glared at the new faces,
assessing them, with a resigned expression.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, Brother! That's precisely why
everyone keeps a distance from you at school!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Um, this is Brother Jack,
he's actually very kind and good—

name: Jack Frost
text:
Stop, stop, stop!
Don't make this introduction any more awkward!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Anyway, everyone!
Please be friends with me and Brother, please!

name: Snegurochka
text: Neither Brother nor I have many friends at school...

Behind Snegurochka, Jack was making
a face that clearly said, "Stop it already!"

name: Tianzun
text:
Friends, huh? Yes, that's a good word!
Don't you think so, everyone?

name: Yoshito
text:
It would be wise for you to stay away from someone like me.
You might not want to make acquaintances with someone who would stab you in the back.

name: Hastur
text:
It would also be wise to stay away from me.
Small lives like yours could be extinguished with a single breath if I so wished.

name: Hastur
text:
...Well, if you are still okay with it?
I might as well satisfy your reckless curiosity, perhaps?

name: Tianzun
text:
What, you guys are troublesome, aren't you?
Can't you just say yes, hmm!?

options.text: This is how it is like over here, so are you sure?
You're really not honest, are you~?

name: Snegurochka
text: Ahahaha, aren't you all and Brother Jack just alike?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I mean, Brother also said something like, 'My surroundings are cold,
and you'll catch a cold if you get close, so stay away.'

name: Jack Frost
text:
We are completely different!
No way, do I really look like that to you...?

name: Hastur
text:
Hey, I cannot let you slide saying that.
I can't stand being treated like the same kind of being as an Old One like me!

name: Jack Frost
text:
What, lizard boy,
if you want to hibernate, I'd gladly help you.

name: Hastur
text:
Lizard... So you dare insult me too!?
Very well, I'll bestow you the ultimate suffering—

name: Snegurochka
text:
S-Sorry!
It's all my fault for saying something thoughtless...!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, girl.
If you're friends, you shouldn't be so reserved, okay?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Seriously, you guys are such a pain...
Fine by me. Ahh, it's Frosty! (High-pitched Voice)

At Korpokkur's words, Jack flinched and froze.
As soon as he realized he'd been tricked, his brow furrowed even more.

name: Korpokkur
text:
See, Snegurochka, I can use magic spells too!
When I use this, Jack's back magically straightens up!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Y..o...u~!!
You're giving me a heart attack, so stop it!

name: Yoshito
text:
An amusement park... and with so many people.
I'm feeling a little excited myself.

options.text: Isn't it just lively and fun, Yoshito?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes... You're right.
I'm a bit nervous since this is unfamiliar to me, but I don't dislike it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Perhaps so.
I might be getting carried away, considering I'm wearing this costume.

options.text: I'm glad you're looking forward to it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Such, undeserved words.
To think you would care about someone as lowly as me...!

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, so where do we go next?
I'm not really looking forward to it, but don't keep me waiting too long, okay?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Um, actually, there's an attraction I want to ride,
and I'm a little curious about this place!

name: Snegurochka
text:
The wait time might be a bit long, but...
Can everyone tell me more about yourselves in the meantime?

name: Tianzun
text:
Of course! So, where should I start?
It was when I first met [Player]—

name: Yoshito
text:
There are plenty of wonderful stories about Master!
Yes, it was when Master met Moritaka—

Snegurochka smiled and told Jack, who was making a disgusted
face at the noisy group, that she was having fun.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Haaah...
Fine, fine, I'll go along with it.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Then I'll tell you the story of how I met Jack.
Back then, he kept his distance from the class...

name: Jack Frost
text: Stop talking about that!!!

It was an amusement park with some strangers, but perhaps because of that,
the conversation never ran dry, and they happily toured the park.
However, a shadow continued to follow them from behind—

...Target confirmed.
Continue tracking without being noticed.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I'm coming now.
Hmph, do you really want me to be here that much!?

options.text: You're going to be left behind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I'm coming now.
Hmph, do you really want me to be here that much!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't touch me so casually!
I'm not a child, just so you know!?

text:
Before Hastur could start walking, he turned back
once more and glared sharply at something in the distance.

name: Tianzun
text:
FOOOOO! Yahoo!
This is what an amusement park is all about!

name: Hastur
text:
How interesting. For a moment, there was an acceleration of several Gs.
Such a fragile human can withstand this load, it seems.

The roller coaster reached the top,
and then began its rapid descent.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, [Player].
If you're scared, I can hold your hand, you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ooh!? You sly fox!
I was planning on doing that!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, we decided seats with rock-paper-scissors, so no hard feelings, right?
Come on, grab my hand if you really are scared.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Good job, [Player]!
Yell louder from your gut, it'll be more fun!

options.text: (Don't like to scream, so watch them from below)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You actually ride roller coasters?
I wouldn't ride it even if you paid me a fortune.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hey, you! Did you just think, 'He looks tough but he's surprisingly soft...' or 'He's a mascot character at an amusement park, yet...'!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I wouldn't dare to...
Everyone has their reasons, like being afraid of heights or getting motion sickness.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]

options.text: Yoshito, you should have ridden it too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine, Master.
It's my duty to stay by your side like this.

options.text: Sorry for making you come with me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine, Master.
It's my duty to stay by your side like this.

options.text: Yoshito, you're not scared of screams, are you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine, Master.
It's my duty to stay by your side like this.

text:
After touring several attractions,
the group decided to stop at a nearby shop for lunch.

The shop sold goods that could be used in the park, like headbands
and popcorn buckets, as well as souvenirs like sweets.

Among them, Frosty goods were by far the most popular.
Frosty himself seemed uneasy, pulling his hood low to avoid attention.

note: (Everyone, say thank you to LW for making Option 3)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you hug it with such a big smile on your face, it makes me feel really embarrassing, or rather...
No, it's nothing...

options.text: Frosty seems to be really popular, huh?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, it's not just my power alone.
It's thanks to the whole amusement park pushing me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, stop it!
I'm warning you, you'll catch a cold!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, [Player], Jack!
Come over here!

[Player] and Jack headed in the direction
Tianzun and the others had called them.

name: Tianzun
text:
How does it look, aren't the balloons great?
Now it really feels like we're happily enjoying the amusement park!

name: Tianzun
text:
Personally, I really want to see Hastur in a costume, too, you know?
I want him to experience that feeling of the extraordinary in daily life.

name: Tianzun
text:
[Player], can't you join me in asking him?
Looking at him, it seems like there's a chance!

name: Hastur
text:
What, you guys! What do you take me for...?
[Player]! You also think I'm fine like this, right!?

options.text: Well, if he hates it so much...

dialogue_after_selection.text: At [Player]'s words, Hastur smiled triumphantly.

options.text: Honestly, I want to see it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmm, if you say so, well, I might consider it...

options.text: I want him to wear it, too?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmm, if you say so, well, I might consider it...

options.text: Speaking of which, Yoshito, that balloon...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Master, did you notice?
This Moritaka balloon...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Notice? It's the most obnoxious thing here!
Where did you even get that from?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I prepared it meticulously,
just in case something like this happened.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
To revolutionize this place into Master's Moritaka Land...
Oops, that was a secret plan I was supposed to keep to myself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Master, did you notice?
This Moritaka balloon...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Notice? It's the most obnoxious thing here!
Where did you even get that from?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I prepared it meticulously,
just in case something like this happened.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
To revolutionize this place into Master's Moritaka Land...
Oops, that was a secret plan I was supposed to keep to myself.

options.text: Yoshito, aren't you surprisingly more into it than I thought?

name: Tianzun
text:
...Still, Korpokkur and Snegurochka aren't here yet.
I gave them both the happiest costumes I found.

Just then, Snegurochka, who had finished changing,
appeared from the back of the shop.

name: Snegurochka
text:
How do I look, everyone?
I'm Magical Girl, no, Magical Sorceress Snegurochka!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, thank you.
I'm a kind-hearted sorceress who helps people in trouble in stories!

name: Snegurochka
text:
There's a slightly mischievous sorcerer, Uncle Tianzun, threatening a magnificent kingdom...
Oh, or maybe I could be his minion!

name: Snegurochka
text:
And then, Yoshito-san, you're a soldier on the kingdom's side,
protecting the kingdom from us!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, very good, very good~! I'll make all the foolish humans in the
kingdom tremble with fear at the overwhelming happiness!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Amazing, that's the absolute worst!
I'll cast a sleeping spell that makes them never want to wake up from their dream of happiness!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Is nobody here in their right mind...?
They're making a ruckus like children.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Come on, Brother, join us.
Brother, you can be my familiar, Frosty!

name: Jack Frost
text:
No way. Why do I have to be your familiar?
I don't want to join, but there must be something else I could do, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, in that worldview,
aren't I the only one left out...?

Next, Korpokkur, who had finished changing,
appeared before the excited group.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Why, of all things, am I wearing such a modern costume?
What will people who know me say...?

options.text: Wait, aren't you looking too cute!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Well... if you say so,
I guess I can put up with it for a while.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Korpokkur-san, you are an enemy from an alien civilization,
here to capture everyone's childlike hearts!

name: Korpokkur
text:
...That setting is too cruel, Snegurochka.
Don't dig directly into my emotional wounds, but in a way, it does sound childlike!

The group chattered and laughed happily.
Meanwhile, some people were watching them from the shadows.

name: Pazuzu
text:
Little lizard... are you having fun?
Everyone seems to be in costume, but...

name: Yuma
text:
Amusement park, more people, than town...
Want to, go home.

name: Alp
text:
Yuma, since we're here, we have to have fun, right?
First, let's ride the roller coaster! And then, and then—

name: Pazuzu
text: You two, please bear with it a little longer.<br<I'm going to see if our little lizard is having fun safely.

name: Pazuzu
text:
Here, Alp, a Frosty ice cream.
And Yuma, a Frosty steamed bun.

name: Yuma
text:
Wow, Frosty, cute, steamed bun.
Too cute to eat...

name: Alp
text:
It's cold and delicious, thank you, Pazuzu-senpai!
This Frosty guy sure is popular, isn't he...

name: Alp
text:
Well, I guess I'll continue my enemy reconnaissance for a bit?
I might as well try to find the secret to the popularity of a formidable rival.

Yes, their true identities were the members of Ueno Academy,
who had also come to the amusement park, worried about Hastur, and—

name: Moritaka
text:
...Phew, that's a relief. I was worried, hearing that it
was his first time meeting everyone except for [Player]-dono...

name: Tanetomo
text:
If you were that worried,
you should have just gone with him.

name: Moritaka
text:
No, if I had, Yoshito... for some reason, would have
held back from me and said, 'You have to go with [Player]-dono.'

name: Moritaka
text:
Besides, we can go together anytime we want.
So I want him to cherish this opportunity.

name: Tanetomo
text:
You're like an overprotective parent, aren't you?
Perhaps your 'bond' among the Eight Dog Warriors is a little special.

name: Moritaka
text:
Although my relationship with Yoshito is slowly changing now...
In the past, we secretly made a brotherly pact that no one knew about.

name: Masanori
text:
I see. So that's why you care so much about him.
And it seems your plan is working so far.

name: Moritaka
text: Hmm, this is...!?

name: Masanori
text:
What's wrong, Moritaka-dono?
Has something happened with Yoshito-dono and the others--?

name: Moritaka
text:
You two, this Frosty ice cream,
is very delicious!

Before Tanetomo and Masanori, who seemed to want to say something,
could speak, Moritaka noticed others nearby having a similar conversation.

name: Moritaka & Pazuzu
text: Huh...?

Unbeknownst to their two sets of guardians,
[Player] and the others had moved to the next attraction.

The group split into several smaller
groups and boarded the teacups.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, listen up, everyone, we're aiming for the fastest!
I'll show you the true power of a Taoist who used to run wild in Penglai.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Wait, wait, wait, too fast, too fast!
My head's spinning~!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Why am I here!? Let me play with the children!?
I don't need to be crammed in here--I want to go there!

In their line of sight, Yoshito and Snegurochka
were enjoying a conversation at a moderate speed.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yoshito-san, that doll you had,
you must have sewed it yourself, right?

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes, it's a proud masterpiece, lovingly shaped after
my beloved childhood friend, Moritaka.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, you really love that person, don't you?
That's so wonderful, I want to hear more about it!

name: Yoshito
text:
No, there's not much to talk about...
Our past is not very clean.

name: Yoshito
text:
My body, my heart...
Are too defiled to touch such an innocent person.

Snegurochka looked sad at Yoshito,
who muttered in a monotone voice.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But perhaps Moritaka-san, your childhood friend, doesn't think so?
Otherwise, he wouldn't be the model for your doll...

name: Yoshito
text:
No, he actually pleaded with me to stop.
He just gave up and stopped saying anything at some point.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ahaha... but I really think Moritaka-san
also cherishes you, Yoshito-san.
Snegurochka smiled as she looked towards a nearby shadow.

And Hastur, too, was looking somewhere,
as if his concentration had broken.

options.text: Are you not having much fun...?
Did you not want to ride with me?

name: Hastur
text:
Hmm... no, it's not that.
This situation is just comical, considering my past with you.

name: Hastur
text:
It's just that, I realized that a dangerous biological disaster
like me should not be in a human domain like this.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You don't need to tell me that.
Even I am surprised myself that I care about such trivial matters.

options.text: Is this a higher being's problem?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I don't want to hear that from you, who exists in a human vessel.
I'm well aware that this isn't like me.
Hastur, who was expected to curse, showed a different expression as usual.

name: Hastur
text: [Player], Yuma...?

It might have been a single mistake—
But that destruction was indeed brought about by Hastur.

Corpses lay at his feet; whose they were was indistinguishable,
melted and no longer retaining their original form.

name: Agent
text:
What you just saw was light sealed in dark matter,
burned into an image by Entertainers.

name: Agent
text:
To put it simply, this Tokyo is looping through time,
and this incident actually happened in a past loop.

name: Agent
text:
There are those in this world who carry over 'memories' of the loops,
and this information was provided by them...

He, too, had vaguely sensed this information from another source,
and thus, he had no choice but to believe it.

name: Agent
text:
You claim to be able to control your power sufficiently,
but have you truly understood how precarious that confidence is?

name: Hastur
text:
Coming to this narrow Tokyo and meeting you all,
I've come to believe that those with power must exercise self-control.

name: Hastur
text:
To be honest, I did come with some expectation.
But perhaps my thinking was a little naive--

name: Hastur
text:
Precisely because I feel a little pleasure here,
if my guard drops and something goes wrong...

Hastur fell silent after that,
like he was reminded of something.

options.text: I want you to have fun.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: You would say that, wouldn't you? I wish I could do that too.

options.text: Since you're here, you have to enjoy yourself!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: You would say that, wouldn't you? I wish I could do that too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You, you're always so clingy!
You don't know how I feel...!

name: Hastur
text:
That being said, this isn't just a problem between you and me.
I don't know if the people around us will tolerate it.

name: Hastur
text:
...You might not have noticed,
but haven't you felt someone watching us for a while?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You dense fool... I checked a few times, and I saw familiar faces.
Those are people from the police organization who view me as a threat.

options.text: I thought it was because everyone was in costume.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You dense fool... I checked a few times, and I saw familiar faces.
Those are people from the police organization who view me as a threat.

options.text: I did feel a bad gaze.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I checked a few times, and I saw familiar faces.
Those are people from the police organization who view me as a threat.

name: Hastur
text:
They don't care even if we notice them.
They're really annoying.

name: Hastur
text:
But, well, I don't entirely blame them.
They probably also have their reasons—

options.text: Why, when you haven't done anything wrong?

name: Hastur
text:
...I'll accept that sentiment of yours.
But my mood has been dampened somewhat; it's time for me to wake from this dream.

As the attraction ended, the cups gradually stopped,
and everyone began to leave their seats.

name: Tianzun
text:
Awww, what's wrong with you guys?
Was this speed not enough for you~?

name: Hastur
text:
...For I have had my fill of fun,
I'll take my leave now.

name: Tianzun
text:
Huh? What's with that glum face?
Did you get into a fight with Hastur?

name: Hastur
text:
No, it's not like that, don't worry.
You all can enjoy yourselves.

Without another word,
Hastur tried to leave.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Noooo--!
You can't say goodbye with such a sad face, absolutely not!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Come on, [Player]-san, Hastur-san,
let's make up!

name: Hastur
text:
Honestly, you all ruined my
consideration for your atmosphere...

Hastur muttered gruffly, but contrary to his
demeanor, his tentacles wriggled happily.

name: Jack Frost, Tianzun & Snegurochka
text:
Eh...!?
We were being watched~!?

name: Hastur
text:
You guys are too loud!
They'll hear you!

name: Yoshito
text:
I see, so you were the target of surveillance.
I had noticed someone following us...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yes, if there was any sign of harm to you, Master, I intended to eliminate them without anyone knowing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh, such humble words. If there was any sign of harm to you, Master, I certainly intended to eliminate them.

options.text: If you noticed, why didn't you tell me!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, I apologize!
I thought I could just eliminate them if anything happened, so I didn't bother to inform you...

name: Yoshito
text:
And I wasn't the only one who noticed.
Korpokkur, you noticed it too, didn't you?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hmm? Oh, well, yes.
I'm sensitive to people's gazes.

name: Jack Frost
text:
From what I hear, it doesn't sound like a pleasant story.
An amusement park is a place where you can forget reality and have fun, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
And for that, the amusement park staff try their
best to keep the outside world out, yet...

name: Korpokkur
text:
At Santa School, this guy might be a delinquent who can't fit into class,
but here, he's Frosty, popular with the kids.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Well, that's to be expected. No matter who you are outside, inside the park,
you're just like any other child. Shall I treat you like a prince?

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, it's rather insulting to be lumped together with those common folk,
wouldn't you say?

name: Yoshito
text:
So, what do you wish, Master?
If you desire, shall I slaughter everyone?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, you don't, the moment you try anything so violent in the park?
I'll freeze you and smash you to pieces.

options.text: Hmm, is there no other way?

name: Hastur
text:
They are public authority. If you make a mistake,
you will suffer the consequences.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But I can't stay silent.
Hastur-san has the right to enjoy the amusement park too, doesn't he?

name: Tianzun
text:
That's right, Snegurochka. Everyone must be happy.
For that, I will bestow upon you my special wisdom!

name: Hastur
text:
What is this special wisdom?
Tell me quickly!

Tianzun, having gathered everyone's attention,
somewhat pompously held back before revealing his plan.

name: Tianzun
text:
It's called "Operation Vanishing"!!
With this many people and this much space, if they lose sight of us once, it's over, right!?

name: Tianzun
text:
What, what's with that lukewarm reaction!?
Don't you underestimate my skills to back out?

name: Tianzun
text:
Alright, lend me your ears, everyone.
Mumble mumble mumble mumble...

name: Hastur
text:
Hey, you!
This is really for the plan, right!?

name: Tianzun
text:
What are you complaining about?
If you have a complaint, come up with a better idea!

Figures watching from afar—
Third parties other than Pazuzu and Moritaka, reacted to the scene.

name: Agent
text:
Hey, the target is making some suspicious moves.
Don't let your guard down.

name: Agent
text:
They've started moving.
Follow them closely so you don't lose sight of them!
Battle Start

name: Agent
text:
Where did they go?
There are so many people, I've lost sight of them...!

name: Agent
text:
Over there, they're heading towards the Ferris wheel.
Follow the target from a little behind!

options.text: Looking forward to the Ferris wheel!

name: Hastur
text:
Why must I do such a thing...?
A coffee cup is one thing, but with you, and in a confined space!?

name: Hastur
text:
Those police officers are overly sensitive and a bit troublesome,
but you are a little too unconcerned.

The two lined up for the Ferris wheel.
The plan was to shake off their pursuers here and meet up at the castle in the center of Snowland.

name: Hastur
text:
However, I'm only accompanying you because
I also have the desire to enjoy myself with you all.

name: Hastur
text:
Besides, I have no reason to tolerate my
enjoyment being interrupted by others.

Soon, their turn came.
Under the watchful eyes of their pursuers, the two certainly boarded the Ferris wheel.

name: Agent
text:
...Wait, isn't this too slow?
Does one rotation of the Ferris wheel really take this long?

name: Agent
text:
But still, we were definitely watching...
Wait a minute!? That parent and child boarded later than the surveillance target!

name: Agent
text:
Does that mean the surveillance target is already gone...?
So we were completely shaken off...

name: Hastur
text:
Hahahaha, it worked, [Player].
I can just imagine their dumbfounded faces.

name: Hastur
text:
It seems they had a strong image of me as the King in Yellow,
but they didn't know that my other alias, the Crown Prince of Evil, is also me.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, as for me, I don't feel particularly
happy about joining this bizarre group.

name: Hastur
text:
But at least for a while,
I'll be able to say goodbye to them.

Hastur looked around.
There were no pursuers, nor any other guests in sight.

name: Hastur
text:
The others haven't arrived yet, it seems.
What are they doing when I told them to go ahead and wait?

name: Hastur
text:
...You're quite prepared, aren't you? Hmph, how about this?
Now I've officially joined the bizarre group.

In the alternate world of the Old Ones, where Hastur—
No, a cursed place where he was imprisoned, Carcosa.

There was a lake where two suns set, and a stone
library where the knowledge of the Old Gods slept.

It controlled disease and heat, harming life.
No one was easily permitted to approach it.

Needless to say for fragile beings like humans.
Hastur, the Transient, was such an Old One.

name: Hastur
text:
Well, it's not bad.
It's not bad to be a little swept up in the excitement.

name: Hastur
text:
N-Now, like Snegurochka calls Jack,
you may call me Brother Hastur, if you wish.

name: Hastur
text:
By the measure of foolish lesser beings,
you and I are apparently half-siblings, aren't we?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nnnh, I see...
Not bad at all.

options.text: You want me to call you that?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Tsk, there's no way!
I just said that jokingly!

options.text: No way I'm calling you that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You! Stop being serious so suddenly!
You are making me look like a fool!

text:
And for some reason, Hastur wrapped his gleaming tentacles,
which were different from usual, around [Player] and pulled them closer.

name: Hastur
text:
Shall I infect you with this heat as well?
You came to Tokyo for that, and you've become like this, haven't you?

Hastur threatened [Player], with a terrifying
expression and demeanor, asserting his dignity.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: You approached me without knowing anything about our past conflicts, and you wouldn't listen when I told you to stay away.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Perhaps because you have the power to cut yourself off from everything in reality, even from my disease?
Or is it something else?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Was it curiosity that made you do it? How foolish.
By the time you touch madness, it's already too late...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: You approached me without knowing anything about our past conflicts, and you wouldn't listen when I told you to stay away.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Perhaps because you have the power to cut yourself off from everything in reality, even from my disease?
Or is it something else?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Was it curiosity that made you do it? How foolish.
By the time you touch madness, it's already too late...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hastur-san, you look amazing!
Like a prince from a story!

name: Hastur
text:
Ahhh, you guys, if you were here, why didn't you say anything!?
Where and what were you doing, anyway?

name: Tianzun
text:
Yoshito said he knew some former police officers, and thought
he could solve the problem by talking to them, so he contacted them.

name: Yoshito
text:
...If you do anything strange to Master,
consider your life forfeited.

name: Hastur
text:
What, what's strange!? How rude!
Who would do such a thing to someone like them...

name: Yoshito
text:
What do you mean, 'someone like them'?
Are you saying Master isn't charming!?

name: Hastur
text:
Ugh, haven't you realized, you troublesome bastard!?
I was just trying to act out the skit you all were doing earlier.

name: Snegurochka
text:
What, if you wanted to join, you should have just said so!
Then Hastur-san, you can be the Prince of the Star Kingdom!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Ahaha, that's what you get for lying.
I guess you can't refuse now, can you?

name: Hastur
text:
It can't be helped, for I am magnanimous.
I might as well humor you a little.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yay!
Then, next...

name: Jack Frost
text:
No matter how much you look at me like that,
I'm definitely not doing it, alright?
Snegurochka and Jack started squabbling like siblings.

name: Hastur
text:
...Hey, you guys...
I must have caused you trouble, didn't I?

Hastur's companions looked at him,
confused at his words.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I don't mind! Hey, since we're already here,
let's go wherever Hastur-san wants to go next!

name: Tianzun
text:
Yes, that's a good idea.
Your happy journey of an amusement park has finally begun.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmm, is that so?
Then I—

The group cheerfully headed towards the next destination,
the attraction Hastur had announced.

Their day at the amusement park,
filled with hope for fun, had just begun.

name: Masanori
text:
Understood, understood.
I will use my connections and ask them directly.

name: Moritaka
text:
What about Yoshito...?
Surely, our perfect surveillance wasn't exposed...?

name: Tanetomo
text:
Well, who knows? If we narrow down the members, perhaps...
But Moritaka-san, you don't seem very good at surveillance.

name: Masanori
text:
It seems there were even more pursuers than us.
They were after Hastur-dono.

name: Pazuzu
text:
Oh, that I have a clue.
Can I also participate in that discussion, if you don't mind?

name: Masanori
text:
I would very much like for you to join.
It would surely make the conversation progress more smoothly.

Tanetomo, the Dog Warrior of Wisdom, who heard their
conversation, seemed to have somewhat anticipated it.

name: Tanetomo
text:
Now, what should we do, Moritaka-san?
Any further pursuit is highly likely to expose us.

name: Tanetomo
text:
It would also be regrettable for me to be seen indulging in such frivolous activities.
The police, no... the decoys, seem to have reached their limit here.

name: Moritaka
text:
What, the police?
What are you talking about!?

Yuma, who also seemed unconcerned by the situation,
was staring intently at Moritaka.

name: Yuma
text: Hey... Moritaka, want to know, something. Moritaka also... do... 'paw'?

name: Alp
text:
Yuma, I see that you have been keeping your eye on Moritaka-kun!
Is it because your roots are wolves, that you're curious about dog-type beastmen?

name: Moritaka
text:
I am not a dog!
And what do you mean, 'also'...!?

name: Yuma
text: Tanetomo, 'paw'...?

name: Tanetomo
text: I beg your pardon??

name: Yuma
text:
Oh, okay...
Understood...

Seeing the two who had already gone to 'discuss'
with the other pursuers, Tanetomo checked the current time.

name: Tanetomo
text:
Since we've come all this way, why don't we enjoy the amusement park,
while taking a route that avoids bumping into them this time?

name: Alp
text:
Yay, sneaking around in the shadows like a spy is fun,
but I was getting bored of it!

name: Moritaka
text:
Are you alright, Yuma-dono?
Beneath Tanetomo-dono's facade, she is the most terrifying when she's angry...

Moritaka realized that Tanetomo was shooting
him a chilling smile and swallowed his words.

name: Tanetomo
text:
Hehe, I'd prefer it if you could
treat me like a princess from a storybook.

name: Tanetomo
text:
Though, I don't really act any different,
even outside the amusement park.

name: Alp
text:
Yes! Then I want to play the role
of the most popular character in that story!

name: Yuma
text:
Then, me, dog...!
Let's go, walk!

name: Moritaka
text:
I'd call her more of an
empress than a princess... Ahem, ahem.

Moritaka and the others' fun day
at the amusement park had just begun.
